job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Staff AI Compiler Engineer, you will be at the forefront of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler development. You'll be responsible for driving the technical direction, solving complex, open-ended problems, and setting priorities for high-impact projects. Your work will shape Axelera AI's software systems and extend beyond your immediate team, with a focus on delivering scalable, flexible solutions to advance our AI platform., * Lead the design, architecture, and hands-on development of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler and SDK.

     * Drive innovation by designing compiler optimizations, focusing on hardware-aware transformations for In-Memory Computing.

     * Execute and technically guide complex projects to ensure our compiler supports workloads beyond classical CNNs (e.g. generative AI) and upcoming generations of our heterogeneous compute platform.

     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on technical strategy, optimizing the Axelera software stack for scalability and performance.

     * Oversee holistically our compilation pipeline and proactively propose changes to ensure best-in-class functional coverage, performance and accuracy.

     * Ensure best practices in the team, especially regarding testing methodologies for compilers.

     * Mentor and guide junior and senior engineers, modeling a standard of excellence and leadership within the team, thereby being a valuable partner to your manager and peers.
job_details.full_text:
Staff AI Compiler Engineer

As a Staff AI Compiler Engineer, you will be at the forefront of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler development. You'll be responsible for driving the technical direction, solving complex, open-ended problems, and setting priorities for high-impact projects. Your work will shape Axelera AI's software systems and extend beyond your immediate team, with a focus on delivering scalable, flexible solutions to advance our AI platform., * Lead the design, architecture, and hands-on development of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler and SDK.

     * Drive innovation by designing compiler optimizations, focusing on hardware-aware transformations for In-Memory Computing.

     * Execute and technically guide complex projects to ensure our compiler supports workloads beyond classical CNNs (e.g. generative AI) and upcoming generations of our heterogeneous compute platform.

     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on technical strategy, optimizing the Axelera software stack for scalability and performance.

     * Oversee holistically our compilation pipeline and proactively propose changes to ensure best-in-class functional coverage, performance and accuracy.

     * Ensure best practices in the team, especially regarding testing methodologies for compilers.

     * Mentor and guide junior and senior engineers, modeling a standard of excellence and leadership within the team, thereby being a valuable partner to your manager and peers.

profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses heavily on compiler development, optimization, and hardware-aware transformations for neural networks, aligning with the core of ML Engineer responsibilities. While generative AI is mentioned, the primary emphasis is on the underlying compilation and optimization infrastructure rather than building generative applications.

phrases.justification: This phrase indicates a need to understand the strategic technical goals and guide the development accordingly, which is a component of business understanding in a technical context.
This involves understanding which projects will have the most significant impact, requiring an awareness of business objectives and their technical implications.
This implies understanding the broader impact and direction of the company's software, linking technical work to business strategy.
This phrase directly connects the technical work to the overall advancement and strategic goals of the company's AI platform.
This highlights the need to understand and contribute to the overarching technical direction, which is tied to business goals.

job_tasks.justification: The job description does not contain explicit mentions of data pipelines, data collection, cleaning, preprocessing, or feature engineering.

phrases.justification: The core of the role involves working with neural networks, which are machine learning models, and developing the tools to compile and optimize them.

phrases.text: designing compiler optimizations, focusing on hardware-aware transformations for In-Memory Computing
phrases.justification: This describes the process of optimizing and adapting models (neural networks) for specific hardware, a key aspect of model development and performance tuning.

phrases.text: compiler supports workloads beyond classical CNNs (e.g. generative AI)
phrases.justification: This indicates the need to adapt and optimize models, including generative AI models, within the compiler framework.

phrases.text: upcoming generations of our heterogeneous compute platform
phrases.justification: This implies working with and optimizing models for new and evolving computational architectures.

phrases.text: optimizing the Axelera software stack for scalability and performance
phrases.justification: This relates to optimizing the performance of the entire software stack, which includes the underlying models being compiled.

phrases.text: best-in-class functional coverage, performance and accuracy
phrases.justification: These are key metrics for evaluating and improving the performance and correctness of models and the compilation process.
Ensuring the correctness and performance of the compiler, which directly impacts the models it processes, is a form of model validation.

phrases.text: Lead the design, architecture, and hands-on development of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler and SDK
phrases.justification: This is a direct description of software development, focusing on the design, architecture, and implementation of a core software component (compiler and SDK).
Indicates direct involvement in writing and building software.
Software Development Kits are core software development artifacts.
While also a soft skill, in this context, it implies integrating the compiler/SDK with other software components and teams.
This involves improving the performance and functionality of the overall software system, which includes the compiler and its integration.
This implies managing and optimizing the end-to-end process of compilation, which is analogous to managing an ML pipeline in MLOps.

phrases.text: propose changes to ensure best-in-class functional coverage, performance and accuracy
phrases.justification: This involves continuous improvement and monitoring of the pipeline's output, akin to monitoring model performance in production.

phrases.text: Ensure best practices in the team, especially regarding testing methodologies for compilers
phrases.justification: Focus on testing methodologies and best practices for a critical software component (compiler) aligns with the operational aspects of ensuring reliability and quality in production.
Directly states the requirement for complex problem-solving abilities.
Requires creative and analytical problem-solving to improve compiler efficiency.
Implies solving complex technical challenges related to hardware and software interaction.
Explicitly mentions the need to work with other teams.
Requires communication to achieve consensus and shared understanding.

phrases.text: partner to your manager and peers
phrases.justification: Indicates the need for effective working relationships and communication.
Implies taking initiative and ownership of the technical path forward.

phrases.text: Drive innovation by designing compiler optimizations
phrases.justification: Directly calls for innovation and proactive development.
Demonstrates a proactive and ownership-driven approach.

phrases.text: take full responsibility for the quality and success of one's work
phrases.justification: This is a direct statement of ownership and responsibility.

phrases.text: Mentor and guide junior and senior engineers
phrases.justification: This involves taking ownership of team development and knowledge sharing.

phrases.text: modeling a standard of excellence and leadership
phrases.justification: Implies taking ownership of setting high standards and leading by example.

phrases.text: upcoming generations of our heterogeneous compute platform
phrases.justification: Suggests a need to adapt to and learn about new hardware and platform developments.

phrases.text: workloads beyond classical CNNs (e.g. generative AI)
phrases.justification: Indicates a need to adapt to and support new types of AI models.
